verbs.description: Vox 's senior corresponent [V: is] suffering from a horrible fear . He worries about Trump being successful with his North Korea policy to the extent that he is now suffering from a mental meltdown .

[ARG0: Vox 's senior corresponent] is [V: suffering] [ARG1: from a horrible fear] . He worries about Trump being successful with his North Korea policy to the extent that he is now suffering from a mental meltdown .

Vox 's senior corresponent is suffering from a horrible fear . [ARG0: He] [V: worries] [ARG1: about Trump being successful with his North Korea policy to the extent that he is now suffering from a mental meltdown] .

Vox 's senior corresponent is suffering from a horrible fear . He worries about [ARG1: Trump] [V: being] [ARG2: successful with his North Korea policy] [ARGM-EXT: to the extent that he is now suffering from a mental meltdown] .
Vox 's senior corresponent is suffering from a horrible fear . He worries about Trump being successful with his North Korea policy to the extent that he [V: is] now suffering from a mental meltdown .

Vox 's senior corresponent is suffering from a horrible fear . He worries about Trump being successful with his North Korea policy to the extent that [ARG0: he] is [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: suffering] [ARG1: from a mental meltdown] .
